summary: American frontiersman Davy Crockett fights in the Creek Indian War, is elected to the U.S. Congress and fights for Texas at the Alamo.
cast: Fess Parker|Buddy Ebsen|Basil Ruysdael|Hans Conried|William Bakewell|Kenneth Tobey|Pat Hogan|Helene Stanley|Nick Cravat|Don Megowan|Mike Mazurki|Jeff Thompson|Henry Joyner|Campbell Brown|Robert Booth|Eugene Brindel|Benjamin Hornbuckle|Jim Maddux|Ray Whitetree|Hank Worden|Hal Youngblood
keywords: character name as title|davy crockett character|seven word title|bayonet charge|bayonet fight
title: Davy Crockett: Rey de la frontera
